title: The Meaning of Meaning, Reality, Cognition and Linguistics (Noam Chomsky, Terence Mckenna)
description: Some clips about how the mind and cognition relates to language and the physical brain. Linguistics and language are not trivial or mundane subjects of inquiry at all, just it takes a great orator like Mckenna, and a great linguist like Chomsky, to fully explain why.
